semantic_identifier: [GOLD-23]: Wire calibration job to use user-defined outcome labels (no fallback to default)
title: Wire calibration job to use user-defined outcome labels (no fallback to default)

sections.text: Update the fit model calibration pipeline to consume the configured outcome selection and label rules (activation/retention/expansion) when generating training labels and features. Remove any implicit fallback to a default outcome when configuration is present, and fail the calibration job with a clear, surfaced error if labels cannot be produced. Add a minimal integration test to verify each outcome path produces distinct labels given the same input signals.
